system.type: INT 35, Forb. Lore (Warp/ Daemonology), Schol. Lore (Occult), Source of Learning.
system.descriptor: Through fell tomes or dark pacts, one learns the art of Sorcery, allowing a non-psyker to wield psychic powers through the use of often chaotic artifacts.
system.uses: Spend 2d10-INT Weeks with a source of learning, such as a Chaos Tome or Dark Pact. Then gain Sorcerer Talent, can spend an additional 1000xp to gain Master Sorcerer at a later time. Can gain new powers by spending the xp cost of the power + 250xp (Cannot learn powers that have a focus time of a Free Action, as casting always requires some kind of ritual). Gain 1d5+1 Corruption when gaining any Sorcery Talent.

description.value: Through fell tomes or dark pacts, one learns the art of Sorcery, allowing a non-psyker to wield psychic powers through the use of often chaotic artifacts.
